title: Height-The minimum height/head-room above a mezzanine floor shall be 2
clause_text: Height-The minimum height/head-room above a mezzanine floor shall be 2.2m. The head-room under a mezzanine floor shall not be less than 2.2m. Other Requirements-A mezzanine floor may be permitted over a room or a compartment, if

source_pdf.text_snippet: Height-The minimum height/head-room above a mezzanine floor shall be 2.2m. The head-room under a mezzanine floor shall not be less than 2.2m.
